what is the mission: Our mission at Innovature is to consistently deliver innovative and high-quality digital solutions that elicit customer delight. We aim to guide clients through their digital transformation by integrating cutting-edge technologies tailored to market demands.
how can i contact:

what is your vision: Our vision at Innovature is to be a global leader in providing innovative digital solutions that empower businesses to thrive in a rapidly changing world. We strive to create a future where technology and creativity converge to drive sustainable growth and success for our clients.

who is gijo sivan: Gijo Sivan is the CEO, Global at Innovature. Based in Japan, he has two decades of experience in web technology, big data, cloud computing, and data mining. He plays a pivotal role in shaping the company‚Äôs global reputation, especially within the Japanese IT industry.
who is ravindranath a v: Ravindranath A V is the CEO, India & Americas at Innovature. He is renowned for his global proficiency in IT strategy, infrastructure, and software services delivery, with a strong focus on innovation and actionable solutions across industries.
who is tiby kuruvila: Tiby Kuruvila is the Chief Advisor at Innovature. He is recognized for his work in project management and technology development, and contributes significantly to business growth and customer satisfaction.
who is yoshitaka nakayama: Yoshitaka Nakayama is the Vice President, Strategic Business Development at Innovature. He has experience in product management, marketing, and business development in both Japan and the U.S., focusing on long-term growth.
who is akira furusawa: Akira Furusawa is responsible for Business Development at Innovature. He leads marketing and sales for Japanese companies and helps expand Innovature‚Äôs system development services globally.
who is jesper b√•geman: Jesper B√•geman is Partner, Technology at Innovature. He focuses on partnerships, sustainability, and team empowerment to deliver impactful technology solutions.
who is wahbe rezek: Wahbe Rezek is an Advisor for AI & Deep Tech at Innovature. He provides strategic insights on artificial intelligence technologies and implementation.
who is unnikrishnan s: Unnikrishnan S is Vice President at Innovature. He has strong experience in project management, operations, and client engagement, and delivers impactful software projects.
who is meghna george: Meghna George is the Head of People Operations at Innovature. She leads HR practices and employee development to shape a culture of growth and excellence.
tell me about the executive team: The executive team at Innovature includes: Gijo Sivan (CEO, Global), Ravindranath A V (CEO, India & Americas), Tiby Kuruvila (Chief Advisor), Yoshitaka Nakayama (VP, Strategic Business Development), Akira Furusawa (Business Development), Jesper B√•geman (Partner, Technology), Wahbe Rezek (Advisor, AI & Deep Tech), Unnikrishnan S (Vice President), and Meghna George (Head, People Operations).
